Token.Abstract: The SSCollectionViewDataSource protocol is adopted by an object that mediates the application's data model for a SSCollectionView object. The data source provides the collection view object with the information it needs to construct and modify a collection view.
Tells the data source to return the number of items in a given section of a collection view. (required)

Parameter.Name: aCollectionView
Parameter.Abstract: The collection view object requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: section
Parameter.Abstract: An index number identifying a section in aCollectionView.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The number of items in section.

Token.Abstract: Asks the data source for an item to insert in a particular location of the collection view. (required)

Parameter.Name: aCollectionView
Parameter.Abstract: A collection view object requesting the item.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: An index path locating an item in aCollectionView.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An object inheriting from SSCollectionViewItem that the collection view can use for the specified row. An assertion is raised if you return nil.

Token.Abstract: Asks the data source to return the number of sections in the table view.

Parameter.Name: aCollectionView
Parameter.Abstract: An object representing the collection view requesting this information.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The number of sections in aCollectionView. The default value is 1.
